alert.note: Alert for South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 2:57AM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph above timberline, and up to 40 mph in valleys. * WHERE...The Mountains of Summit County, the Mosquito Range, and the Indian Peaks. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult late tonight and early Wednesday morning. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact overnight travel and the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet
